<Heading

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/data/sources/{dataSourceId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Remove a data source connection

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
>
  <Translate id="theme.openapi.request.title">Request</Translate>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails

>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
